description:
Build a global military empire and crush your enemies in War of Nations! Battle other players, take over the world and become the most dominant nation!

Construct bases, train military units, and deploy armies across a gigantic world in this massively multiplayer strategy game. Engage in epic battles with other players and capture their bases. Fight over valuable resources, form alliances, and coordinate attacks with other players.

Features:
• FREE Strategy MMO with military combat
• Build bases and expand across the world
• Send armies across the world to capture and destroy your enemies in PvP
• Coordinate strategic battles
• Play with friends and form an alliance
• Mine for valuable resources to build an army
• Research new technologies and hi-tech units
• Level up powerful commanders to command your armies
• Watch epic battles

Visit our Forums: funzio.com/forum
Follow us on Twitter: @GREEgames
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEgames
Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgames

Use of this application is governed by GREE's Terms of Service. In addition, please note that GREE respects your privacy and asks you to review the GREE Privacy Policy. The GREE Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found in the Legal section below as well as at http://product.gree.net/us/en/terms/.
releaseNotes:
Get ready! War of Nations BIGGEST UPDATE EVER! Awesome new features include:

***IMPLANTS – Make your commanders stronger than ever before! Implants will allow you to individually upgrade commander traits by combining specific enhancements with your existing commanders!

***NEW RESEARCH – Want your units to get to the enemy FASTER? Unit Travel Speed Research makes it possible! 

***NEW ALLIANCE BOOSTS – Make use of all those Scrap Metal, Microchips, and Salvaged Batteries with the introduction of SIX new Alliance Boosts!

***FREE GOLD – Now you can get FREE GOLD every day just by playing the game! As you play, gold is constantly being generated. Just tap and collect to grow your stockpile!

***GLOBAL EVENTS – Compete with other players ACROSS ALL WORLDS in special new events and win epic prizes!

***Performance improvements and bug fixes
